tasks.task: Assemble a water distribution system using a water tower.
subtasks: Position water extractor at the starting point.
Install pumps along the initial pipe line to lift water to the top.
Guide the lifted water to the required floor level.
Transfer the water to the water plant at the designated floor.
Connect subsequent pump segments to the main system for continuous water transport.

tasks.task: Construct a multi-level water distribution network with minimal pumping requirements.
subtasks: Utilize a water tower to elevate water efficiently across different floors.
Adjust pipe connections to align with each floor's water needs.
Integrate additional pumps at lower levels to pressurize the water system.

tasks.task: Manage resource allocation for water distribution infrastructure.
subtasks: Optimize the number of pumps to reduce waste and increase efficiency.
Evaluate water elevation needs for each floor.
Balance pumping capacity to meet system demands without overexertion.
